storyInfo: The villagers are extremely wary of Fang Xiaoshi, who left the village many years ago. In order to protect him from further danger, Qiubai stays behind and learns about a past event from the Clan Elder.

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi! What are you doing up on the rafters?! Get down here this instant!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: This is the Yishan Temple, so take your antics anywhere else but here!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Not a chance!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The village is so big, why did you have to dump this lousy temple on our family's land? You're just bullying us! Zhou Liu, why not dump it at your place instead?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You know nothing, brat. The temple has been protecting Moushan Village for a thousand years, you don't just pick it up and move it.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: The entire village agreed to this arrangement, it's not up to you!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Bah!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Didn't this land used to be completely barren? Why didn't you say the feng shui was good then? You're telling me after all these years my dad worked to make the soil fertile, the feng shui just happened to improve at the same time?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I'll come out and say it, you thought you could step up and bully the only outsiders in this village. Well, let me tell you, you're wrong!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Dad might just take it, but I sure won't!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You want the temple to protect the harvest? Well, I wanna blow it up so we can actually grow something to eat!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You wouldn't dareâ€”
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: So many faces showing up at your door upon your return. I've only seen that happen to gamblers.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Well, I guess you were talking at least a little truth on the way here. The villagers certainly don't want you around.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That's why I told you to not bring me here.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: But you never said why exactly...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The small yard is packed full of people, but none of the villagers move to start a conversation. They just stare at Qiubai and Fang Xiaoshi like the two of them are strange new beasts they can't let out.
*cough* *cough* Let... me through...
What's everyone bumbling about here for? Even Xiaoshi's manyue wasn't this lively...
A thin and tall man stumbles out from the crowd with labored breaths. His back, carrying a log, is as bent as the bow at his hip.
The man sights Fang Xiaoshi and freezes for a second, before quickly averting his gaze and slowly turning away.
Dad...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Hunter...
attributes.name: Nervous Villager

attributes.content: Hey, don't you forget our agreement...
attributes.name: Nervous Villager

attributes.content: I don't forget.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: But Xiaoshi has been away from home for three whole years. He should have something to eat first, shouldn't he?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Let's head back. We can sort things out with the village later.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: The fieldwork's already been lagging lately. In just a few days, Chunfen will have been and gone.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: All that babbling on the way here, and you turn mute in front of your dad?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Dad... I found you.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The hunter presses his pale lips together, and without answering his son goes into the house, setting his log against the wall.
The boy freezes in place. Qiubai prods him with the hilt of her sword.
Please, Miss, have a seat. Thanks for bringing the kid home, I'm sure it took some effort. And please, have a drink.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: No need. I don't want to interrupt the reunion.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll take a look around the village.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll give you the tour...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You stay put.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Miss, Miss... if I could have just a moment?
Zhou Liu is out there talking about a heroic heroine who brought Fang Xiaoshi home, so I had to see for myself.
attributes.name: Amiable Old Man

attributes.content: Taking a look at you, you must be...
attributes.name: Amiable Old Man

attributes.content: I am called Qiubai, from Jianghu.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Everyone here in Moushan is of the Zhou Clan. I am Zhou Shun, village headman and Clan Elder.
attributes.name: Amiable Old Man

attributes.content: Our village is tucked away here in the northwest reaches of Yan, so we hardly ever see strangers.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Rest assured. I'm nothing but a Jianghu wanderer. I have no ill intent.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, Miss, that's not what I meant to imply...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I happened to come across the boy out on his own, so I took a little detour and brought him back here.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Miss, you're a chivalrous one.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Dear guest from afar, a poor village like ours has nothing much to offer, but if you don't mind...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: A few meters away from them stands a well.
Something crashes into the bucket above the well, sending it to the bottom.
A long sword juts out to hold the mechanism in place, pulling the rope taut.
Qiubai drags the bucket up.
Just a scared little burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Looks like the one from Zhou Dazhi's place...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Its mother died in childbirth, leaving this poor thing to grow up alone, so it's as tame as can be. It probably just got startled.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: It's not hurt, at least. Seems like it passed out from all the water.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, about that... how did you move to the well so fast? I feel like my vision blurred for a moment...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Was that kung fu?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: The well is full of muddy water.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Yes... it was raining heavily last week, and the mud has yet to settle.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: *sigh*, the last two years of drought have seen most of our crops wither away.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: No wonder there are so many wells around the village.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Heaven can be very unreasonable at times. We either get nary a drop, or a nigh disastrous deluge.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Miss Qiu, where did you come here from?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Yumen.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But I believe I detect Jiangqi accent...?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I was born there.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I see... If you came from Yumen, you must have entered the village from the north. Head further south, and you'll find a section of the Chidao washed away by a mudslide.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Life is hard here.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: With two raucous grunts, the young burdenbeast wakes up. The swordswoman loosens her grip, and it bolts around a corner in a blink, leaving nothing but a withered acacia tree in front of her.
It's already late March, but spring has apparently not yet come to this small, northwestern village.
Indeed, this is a perilous place. You said you came across the boy all alone? He must have gone through a lot after leaving the village.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Miss, I'd like to ask you something... what sort of trouble did the lad get up to out there?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: No trouble to speak of. He was just lost out in the wilderness.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That boy has been particularly rowdy, ever since he was little.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Elder, I have some questions about Fang Xiaoshi.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The villagers... they seem hostile toward the boy?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: After a long period of silence, the man turns around and goes into a back room. He soon returns with a pile of beasthides and bones.
Take these.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Dad? What for?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: This is all we have. Spring has barely come, so prey has been scarce. But they're still worth something. Give them to her as payment.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Is it not enough?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: We don't have anything else, so I guess I'll beg her for mercy... although she doesn't seem like the talkative type.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: She's not a debt collector!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You must've stolen or broken something, why else would she walk you all the way back here?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Do you really think I can't do anything right?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You've done more than a little wrong...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Tian ah! This door... this pillar... it's been split in two...
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: The temple stood here for centuries, protecting us, but it's been ruined... such disrespect!
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: Well, it's lucky the ancestral tablet seems mostly fine. Enough kowtowing already, let's find whoever did this.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Say... Where's Fang Xiaoshi? Gone without a trace...
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: I think the kid got caught up in the explosion, I saw him bleeding and limping out of the village. He had so many bombs on him... serves him right.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: All for a piece of land we could have negotiated over. We definitely could have resolved this peacefully.
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Go tell the Elder, I'll head to the hunter's place.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Didn't you say he ran away from the village?
attributes.name: Astonished Villager

attributes.content: The kid was hurt pretty bad. I'd better get the hunter to look for him!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: He blew up the village temple with his own explosives?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Three years ago... he was probably just eleven or twelve years old?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: His father sometimes hunted with explosives to cave in beast nests and such. That child is as smart as he is audacious, and must've figured out how to make them too.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: From my personal experience... this certainly seems like something he would do.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's the temple at the village entrance, isn't it? It looked pretty unique, even at a glance. Who's it dedicated to?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Our very ancestors.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Back in the day... eight hundred years ago, or a thousand? How long ago exactly, I'm not so sure myself. The story has been passed down from generation to generation, after all.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Anyway, in those times, there was nothing here but mountains, so dense that not even fowlbeasts could fly over.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Our ancestor, alone and armed with only a hoe, dug out a mountain and turned it into arable land, eventually forming this village.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: You should have seen it on the way here, Miss? Barren land in all directions, as far as the eye can see, but here we manage to farm and feed our hundred or so people. We're sheltered from most Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: He took a hoe and plowed out a living from Heaven itself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: We call it the Yishan Temple, in thanks to our benevolent ancestor, and to commemorate that he lives on in us forever.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: This here temple has blessed our Moushan village with a thousand years of peace and quiet.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: We all know that a few measly buildings made of wood and dirt won't affect the harvest at all.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: But us Moushan villagers have lived like this for generations. We have our nostalgia, and it puts our minds at ease.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Dad, iff you want to yell at me, just do it.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The way you're staring at me, it's awkward.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You've grown tall, but not much otherwise.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: You must not have been eating well while out there, all these years.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Of all the things to say...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: As long as you're alive... that's all that matters... I was just worried...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: How did you make your way here?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: We walked along the Chidao, and occasionally hitched a ride with merchant caravans we came across, hopping on their burdenbeasts.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: How long was the journey?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Probably about a month.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You went so far...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Dad...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: All these years, you...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Barely making a living
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: The harvest has been getting worse these past few years. First, an infestation destroyed our crops. Then came the drought, Heaven refused to give us a single drop of water, not from the sky, not from the wells, no matter how many we dug.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: And now this year, Chunfen has come. It's the right time for sowing, but then we face a brutal storm.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Who knows if the land has always been this temperamental, or if Heaven has turned against us.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Or maybe the village ancestors refuse to bless us...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: And it's because I blew up that temple. That's what you want to say, right?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: That's not what I meant...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: That's what a lazy person would say.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: 'Farming is all about working the soil with the tool in your hand.' That's what you told me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The idol in the temple can't move, how could it help us with the harvest?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: We can't say things like that... we've got to talk it through with them. Besides, we're the ones who wronged them first...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Dad, the villagers bully you because they think you're a coward!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What about the mountains slowly eating up the fields? Sooner or later, even the temple is going to get washed away by a mudslide. It's just a monument, why not put it in Zhou Liu's backyard? He has so much room and he's not even growing anything.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: They bully us because we're outsiders!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: *sigh* Let's just drop it already, alright...?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I see, so that's why the villagers had such a visceral reaction to Fang Xiaoshi.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Well, not exactly.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: We all thought the boy was already...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: He was injured when he fled into the wilderness after blowing up the temple.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Did you not look for him?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: We did.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I gathered a party overnight and we spent several days searching dozens of li, to no avail.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I hear the villages of Jiangnan stand out like bright lights in the darkness.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: But for us here, in the mountains, all you see is gray and yellow, or boundless white in winter. Settlements look more like perfect hiding spots.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Beasts roam freely, so the roads are not safe. Sometimes, you even run into fleeing bandits.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: So a boy that small, hurt so badly...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Is still alive and well. Seems like the kid has been through a lot.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: As long as he is safe.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Elder, I have something to say...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Please, speak freely.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I happened across Fang Xiaoshi, and brought him here. I have no reason to meddle in your village's affairs.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: However, since I took on the initiative to bring him back, I am also responsible for his safety.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...As you should be.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I can't say I'm good at reading people, but after having traveled with him for a while, I at least understand him a little.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: He may be stubborn and willful, but he is by no means a bad person.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: So I hope you won't make things difficult for him.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, I thought you were going to say something else.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Please, rest assured, Miss. We Moushan villagers may be poor, but we are reasonable people.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: To hold a grudge... who or what exactly should we hold a grudge against? The mountains, Heaven, or...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: A little boy around ten years old?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: As you said, life is hard here. Moving the temple was just to put the villagers' minds at ease. Though now when I think about it, we were indeed quite inconsiderate at the time.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: That is to say, I'm the one at fault here.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: You are a man of sense.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You don't have to explain it all to me. After all, Fang Xiaoshi did do wrong. If still hasn't matured, even after so much hardship these last three years, he will have to be disciplined.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Make mistakes, suffer the consequences, remember your actions and gain insight. That makes life less painful.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You're very perceptive.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Not really.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I have my explanation, and I'm relieved.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Yes, yes...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Yes, I bombed the temple. And after three years I, Fang Xiaoshi, have returned. If they can't get over that, they can come find me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Even now, today, I still want to blow the thing up.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Fine, go do it! Blow it to pieces!
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Three years ago, your nerve was as high Heaven itself, and now three years later, it's soared even higher.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: What did you come back for? Just to blow it up and run away again?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I'm done talking, Dad.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: What did you bring that log in for anyway?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: ...I'm making a coffin.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Your father's health is failing with each passing day, and all the money I saved for my burial went to rebuild the temple.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I didn't know if you were dead or alive, so I... I thought I should at least make my own coffin while I could.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Hey, come on, no need to talk like that...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I spent a whole month looking for you.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I was hurt. I passed out near the Chidao...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You sure are smart.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: A caravan carrying goods from the mountains found me and threw me onto the back of some burdenbeast carrying fodder. By the time I came to, I was already in a nomadic city.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: It's lucky some good people found you, and not a pack of beasts.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: What happened after you healed up?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I, I decided to make a name for myself before coming back.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Why aren't you asking me what I did in the city?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: If you actually accomplished something, there wouldn't have been a swordswoman escorting you home.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I said it before, you can't bear to live here, but I'm afraid you'll suffer even more if you go out to a town or nomadic city. Returning with your life intact is already a blessing to me.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I've never been to a city, so I have no idea of what it's like. When you feel like talking about it, you can let me know.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: So, are you going to cause a ruckus this time?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Only if they bully us.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You're still so stubborn...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: The day you ran away, the Elder gathered up the whole village to help me look for you.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I live here alone, but the villagers don't give me a hard time. That plot of land you keep bringing up, haven't I been tending to it even now?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: That just means they have some shred of conscience left in them.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Can you just promise your dad one thing?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Just stay here for good... and don't make a fuss about it...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Fine, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: So you're leaving? Going to Jiangnan?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I have places to be. Bringing you back here has already delayed my journey by a lot.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Then there's no harm in delaying it a while more, right? It's dark already. Why not rest here a few more days and teach me some kung fu before you go!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Didn't I teach you enough on the way here?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Dad, let's...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Miss, thank you so much for bringing my boy home. We have nothing to repay you with...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Since you're in a hurry, I won't pressure you to stay.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi, we may have met by chance, but I have some parting words for you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The Jianghu can be vicious, and you have learned something, whether you wanted to or not. But now that you're home, you should make your peace and avoid causing any more trouble.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Hmph, I can make a name for myself wherever I am. One day, in Jiangnan, you'll hear all about the valiant Fang Xiaoshi's deeds!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: As long as I don't hear of you making mischief.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And whoever you trouble next, she may not be as forgiving as I am.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You, forgiving...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Oh hey, can you say that line the heroes always say... the one in all the novels...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: 'Jianghu zai jian.'
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Jianghu zai jian. See you around, kid.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Miss, let me see you off.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: No need to trouble yourself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's alright.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: We haven't done any work on the roads for a long time, so they're full of holes. I'll guide you to the gate.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Qiubai walks at a brisk pace, and the old man quickens his steps to catch up, ending the conversation.
The sky gradually turns dark. It may be strange to ordinary folk, but Jianghu adventurers prefer to travel at night, using the darkness to their advantage.
The newly raised grave at the entrance of the village is stubby and inconspicuous, hardly visible in the twilight.
Zhou Si, is everyone here?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I'll count again, Elder.
attributes.name: Bystander Villager

attributes.content: Aside from Dayuan who stepped on his plow out in the fields today and couldn't make it, everyone else is here.
attributes.name: Bystander Villager

attributes.content: The whole village is here, Dad? Isn't this a bit much for a welcoming party?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: We're not Zhous, after all. Even when they had that meeting at the temple back then, there was nothing for us.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Considering what's happened today, and how we're mixed up in it...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Three years later, Fang Xiaoshi stands once again before the temple. This time there are no explosives, and the man beside him is even older.

The wall he blew up has already been rebuilt and the statue of the mountain digger repaired, but the craftsmanship is a little lacking, and upon seeing this slightly amusing sight Fang Xiaoshi carelessly lets out a laugh.
There are several broken tiles on the floor, with bugs in the still-damaged ceiling forming layers and layers of webbing that blends into the wood.
Perhaps it is too dark to be certain, but he can't figure out if the temple was impossible to renovate, or if it was successfully repaired but has gradually returned to a dilapidated state.
So, this is where we stand now.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Xiaoshi has apologized. He was still a child then, and the hunter has spent the last three years doing his best to help rebuild the Yishan temple.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Come on, Elder. Let's get to the point already.
attributes.name: Bystander Villager

attributes.content: Hunter, how many years has it been since you first came to the village?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: This year-end, it'll be twenty one.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Your family is the only one with a different name, but you married a daughter of ours, so all these years you have been a part of our family.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Let our previous bumps in the road, misunderstandings and conflicts, all stay in the past.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: From this day forward, the clan officially accepts you into our family and our ancestors will bless you with peace and prosperity as well.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Xiaoshi may change his family name to Zhou too, if he so wishes.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What are you trying to pull this time...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Nuh-uh, I like my own name just fine. Why would I change it?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Elder, just come out and say what you mean already.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: In the end... we are all one family, and that means we face our challenges together.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I gathered the whole village here today, to make one request:
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Xiaoshi, for the sake of the village... can you pretend to be dead?
attributes.name: Clan Elder
